title: Be warned you can get banned for this
body: dear league community, after the last update ive been having a error with my league i followed the correct steps such as downloading the hextech app from riot to fix bugs, this also did not work i tried repatching and more, nothing i did seemed to work, the error told me to get the logs from my league of legends files and send it in with my support ticket to help riot fix the problem, while trying to find the logs i deleted my english file i think, or deleted a file somewhere whilst trying to locate the logs (im not very good at using computers) and by deleting or cutting or moving this file by accident i was banned for trying to modify my account? thats bullshit i was trying to do what the riot websites say in support on on the patcher itself, so by me trying to fix my game im now perma banned?, ive sent in tickets about this issue but i wanted to alert everyone if you have this error DO NOT try and foolow what riot has said your better off waiting till theres a solid fix (please up this to spread awareness) and help support me getting the investigation by account deserves. this is bs an you have fked up riot.

replies.body: My partner was permanently suspended for 'exploiting' the game. We are racking our brains as to what that means, what might have triggered it and can't figure it out. They don't tell you anything going through the email system of contact.

Hey there,

Simply deleting or editing a file like that wouldn't trigger a flag on your account, only the use of third party software or actual modifications to your client that are disallowed (Things you cannot do by simply editing a file) would do so.

I would recommend you do as you said you have done and submit a ticket to Player Support to have your case reviewed.

Just waiting on a reply yo my ticket as i didnt had anything the most i did was remove somthing, which has caused my launcher not to download/update i cant even get past part 2/2 of the update process cause of this bug. but i defaiantly didnt use any 3rd party software, inless the hextech fixer thing that support recmmends is a 3rd party?
